title.de: Nimm von uns, Herr, du treuer Gott

instrumentation: soprano, alto, tenor, bass, choir (SATB), cornett, 3 trombones, 2 oboes, oboe da caccia, taille, flauto traverso, 2 violins, viola, basso continuo
notes: Composed for the tenth Sunday after Trinity.

movements.title: Nimm von uns, Herr, du treuer Gott
